import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { addTodo } from '../actions' import {Container} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Row} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap' const AddTodo = ({ dispatch }) => { let input a = { b: 'c' }; return (

Welcome to Todo List App

{ e.preventDefault() if (!input.value.trim()) { return } dispatch(addTodo(input.value)) input.value = '' }}> input = node} placeholder="What do you want todo?"/>
) } export default connect()(AddTodo)
